name: Smoke It Off!
description:
Smoke It Off! 

A game about making smoke bombs created in 48 hours for the WikiHow Game Jam!

Learn how to make a smoke bomb!

There was not enough time to create a tutorial so you  can go to https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Ninja-Impact-Smoke-Bomb for instructions or follow mine bellow.

Controls: 

Regular controls

Left Mouse to pick up

Right Mouse to use item or throw item

Steps for creation:

1) First combine sugar and KNO3 (the white powders) in the bowl on the scale.

2) It's cooking time! Bring the bowl to the kitchen and pour the contents into the pan.

3) The mixture is done when it turns a light poop brown, and it can then be poured into the holy toilet paper tube.

4) Pick up and throw the smoke bomb and watch as your vision disappears.

5) Wait for smoke to run out before picking up.  Repeat.
